classes.name: Jedi Guardian
classes.description:
Guardians are the wall between the good people of the 
                          Republic and their enemies. They stand firm in the face of overwhelming odds 
                          and dare opponents to attack

classes.name: Ifantry
classes.description: We will serve our purpose, we fight with honor!

classes.name: Sith Lord
classes.description: The dark side of the force is strong in you, I can sense it.

classes.name: Jedi Master
classes.description: We will be with you, Always
